title: Smart Data Models - AnalogControl
description: Adapted from CIM data models. An analog control used for supervisory control.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AnalogControl

AnalogValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The Control variable associated with the MeasurementValue. Default: None

maxValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Normal value range maximum for any of the Control.value. Used for scaling, e.g. in bar graphs. Default: 0.0

minValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Normal value range minimum for any of the Control.value. Used for scaling, e.g. in bar graphs. Default: 0.0
